body: Yeahhh... I hate it, but that doesn't mean I think we should remove it! Imagine sending death threats over something you voluntarily chose to read lmaooooo. If u dont like it, dont read it and stop being a bitch ass pussy

Hey, guess what! It is a drawing. It is also about a fictional situation, so nobody was harmed in any way by the creation of this product. This argument (inspired by reason/logic) should be enough for all the "holier than thou" crowd - don't like it, DON'T READ IT.
